Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-226, see notes following ยง 1-129.01.

DC CODE ยง 1-129.06

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Any legal action arising from the application of any rule or procedure adopted by or prescribed by, or with respect to any determination of, the Commission pursuant to this subpart shall be filed within 90 days after the date of the occurrence of the event that is the subject of the legal proceeding.

In any legal action arising from actions of the Commission, or from the Commission's failure to act, the Commission shall be represented by the Attorney General of the District of Columbia, or counsel of its choosing.

subpart.text: District of Columbia Statehood Delegation Fund Commission.

heading.catch_text: Limitations on actions; representation by Attorney General of the District of Columbia.
